content: Hello! Thank you for wonderful article with insights, but… I’ am a total newbie, sitting on Windows 10 machine and wondering for about and hour and half how to run this script and start automating the process. I have nothing in common with programming languages and all of that seems to be like a black magic for me. I’ve already installed Python and edited some files but… don’t know how to run it. I really don’t understand how can I make it work. If you’re a good soul or something and want to help me… then please, I will be more than grateful. I can also donate some money for someone who will help me with running this script and making it work on my account. Thanks in advance guys. :)
